title: Introducing: JOSEPH
content: A little late on the pick up with JOSEPH, who according to the fantastic blog SelfBlown,Â has been kicking around for a while now. The only track available on his Soundcloud so far is the stunning, unfurling beauty of Swim Darker. Elements of King Krule and Bipolar Sunshine kick in, with its poignantly raw, soulful nature. Check out Swim Darker below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
